-spec missing_integer(Nums :: [integer()]) -> integer().
missing_integer(Nums) ->
    SortedNums = lists:sort(Nums),
    find_missing_integer(SortedNums, SortedNums, 0, hd(SortedNums)).

find_missing_integer(_SortedNums, [], SeqLen, SeqSum) ->
    SeqSum + 1; % If we've iterated through all numbers, return SeqSum + 1
find_missing_integer(SortedNums, [H|T], SeqLen, SeqSum) ->
    ExpectedNext = SeqLen + SeqSum,
    if
        H =< ExpectedNext ->
            NewSeqLen = if H == ExpectedNext -> SeqLen + 1; true -> SeqLen end,
            NewSeqSum = if H == ExpectedNext -> SeqSum + H; true -> SeqSum end,
            find_missing_integer(SortedNums, T, NewSeqLen, NewSeqSum);
        true ->
            SeqSum + 1
    end.
